Lubbock.KRFE:
KRFE is a radio station licensed to Lubbock, Texas, broadcasting on 580 AM. The station presently airs a News/Talk/Sports format after dropping its long-time format of easy listening music & local talk shows on October 24, 2016. Local hosts include Wade Wilkes, Jim Stewart, Cliff Wilkes and Jay Leeson.
KRFE AM in its history previously used the call signs of KDAV AM, KRLB AM and KJBX AM.
Previous formats have included full-service Country, Pop, ABC Stardust, R&B/Rap, Hot A/C, and a hybrid of Easy Listening Music & local talk shows (reminiscent of KAAM-AM's former format in Dallas/Ft.
